comment:
Distance: 1250m Conditions: Moderate cross / head wind - 15-18mph Comments: BC High 2V raced "up" in the 1V race and BC High 3V and 4V raced Boston Latin 2V. Thank you to Boston Latin for a great morning of racing in blustery conditions.

None
regatta_display_name: NEIRA Boys Eights,Boston Latin vs BC High
